BackstoryDef.title: ratkin wild-born
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] grew up in the wild, faraway from any form of civilization. [PAWN_pronoun] did not receive a proper upbringing for a Ratkin child, the wilderness became both their teacher and parent instead.

BackstoryDef.title: ratkin undergrounder
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] spent most of their life in dark underground caves. Growing tired of their gloomy environment, [PAWN_pronoun] left their fellows and went above ground.

BackstoryDef.title: ratkin country kid
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: For generations [PAWN_nameDef]'s predecessors have been farmers. [PAWN_pronoun] grew up in close proximity to nature and was pure of heart, living a simple life until a turning point changed their fate.

BackstoryDef.title: ratkin shepherd boy
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] grew up with animals since childhood. [PAWN_pronoun] regards animals as friends.

BackstoryDef.title: ratkin orphan
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: Abandoned, [PAWN_nameDef] grew up as an orphan. Lacking technical knowledge, [PAWN_pronoun] learned survival skills the hard way to live on their own.

BackstoryDef.title: ratkin student
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef]'s family wasn't wealthy, but is able give [PAWN_nameDef] an education. [PAWN_pronoun] had the intellect to excel in their studies but not was physically weak.

BackstoryDef.title: ratkin little librarian
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was a bookworm due to the influence of [PAWN_pronoun] librarian parents. As a result, [PAWN_pronoun] is book smart but developed terrible eyesight due to bad reading habits.

BackstoryDef.title: ratkin golden spoon
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was born in a affluent household. [PAWN_pronoun] was raised in an isolated environment surrounded by various works of art.

BackstoryDef.title: ratkin bastard
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was born as a child of a concubine. [PAWN_pronoun] became a fugitive after getting embroiled in a dispute over inheritance.

BackstoryDef.title: ratkin heir
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was born as an heir of a fallen noble family. Family disgraced, [PAWN_pronoun] left out their house to seeking fortune and to redeem their family's status.

BackstoryDef.title: ratkin guardener aspirant
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] went on the path to become a Guardener. Studying to be more proficient with both farming and combat.

BackstoryDef.title: ratkin chef student
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] wanted to become a chef due to their love of food. For [PAWN_nameDef], eating is one of life's greatest joys. [PAWN_pronoun] once left for an adventure to just eat more delicious food.

BackstoryDef.title: ratkin romany kid
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] wandered around aimlessly from place to place. [PAWN_pronoun] learned various survival skills essential to nomadic life except the proper social skills needed to fit into general Ratkin society.

BackstoryDef.title: ratkin officer child
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was born as a child of commissioned officer. [PAWN_pronoun] was raised at a very young age to be a skilled shot and leader of Ratkin and became haughty as a result.

BackstoryDef.title: ratkin merchant kid
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was born as a child of merchant. [PAWN_pronoun] learned how to handle and make money from helping with simple tasks in the family's business.

BackstoryDef.title: ratkin kid
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] is just a normal kid. While [PAWN_pronoun] didn't receive any formal education, [PAWN_pronoun] was homeschooled by their parents with the best of their abilities.

BackstoryDef.title: ratkin servant child
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was born as a child of a servant of a noble household. By law, [PAWN_pronoun] is also destined to become a servant. [PAWN_pronoun] wanted to be something more so [PAWN_pronoun] ran away to change their destiny.

BackstoryDef.title: ratkin human assistant
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: Unlike other test subjects, [PAWN_nameDef] served as an assistant to Human researchers to do menial tasks and small chores. [PAWN_pronoun] became some sort of mascot and was treated more of a pet rather than a test subject.

BackstoryDef.title: ratkin city kid
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was born and raised in an urban environment. [PAWN_pronoun] was exposed to city life and culture, learning crafts instead of farming unlike most Ratkin.

BackstoryDef.title: ratkin slave kid
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] has been branded as a slave for as long as they could remember. One day [PAWN_pronoun] ran away seeking freedom because they couldn't bear all the chores.

BackstoryDef.title: ratkin test subject
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was vatgrown in a research facility. [PAWN_pronoun] was genetically engineered as a test subject for super soldier development. [PAWN_pronoun] grew up confined in a white room doing nothing but the training routine set by researchers.

BackstoryDef.title: ratkin petty theft
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] has sticky fingers, always "borrowing" things. [PAWN_pronoun] was forced to servitude as punishment for their frequent theft. Rather than continue to suffer the consequences, [PAWN_pronoun] escaped by taking advantage of a raider attack.

BackstoryDef.title: ratkin caravan merchant
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] is a leader of a trade caravan. After being attacked and losing all their wares and silver, [PAWN_pronoun] decided to rebuild and live a new life.

BackstoryDef.title: ratkin wanderer
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] is a wanderer who roams around aimlessly throughout the world, living a nomadic lifestyle and being as free as the wind. For [PAWN_pronoun], a life tending to the fields is just a faraway dream.

BackstoryDef.title: ratkin farmer
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] is a farmer as with their predecessors for many generations. It's almost certain that their children will become farmers as well.

BackstoryDef.title: ratkin miner
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] is skilled at digging through dirt and stone from a young age, and so became a miner. [PAWN_pronoun] secretly dreams from time to time to dig their way out of the narrow and stuffy mines.

BackstoryDef.title: ratkin hunter
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: Instead of working in the fields, [PAWN_nameDef] became a hunter. Unlike most Ratkin, [PAWN_pronoun] had good eyesight so could see animals moving from far away.

BackstoryDef.title: ratkin shepherd
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] works at a pasture raising sheep and various other livestock. [PAWN_pronoun] used to care for many animals until a ship crash spread pollution and poisoned the fields.

BackstoryDef.title: ratkin civilian
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] is a citizen of the Ratkin kingdom. [PAWN_pronoun] has been living a simple life doing menial tasks in the city.

BackstoryDef.title: ratkin noble
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] is a former noble of the Ratkin kingdom. [PAWN_pronoun] was forced to go into exile due to political intrigue. [PAWN_pronoun] vowed to restore their title and wealth through whatever means necessary.

BackstoryDef.title: ratkin city merchant
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] is a tradesman who runs a small store in the city. [PAWN_pronoun] makes a living selling all kinds of wares [PAWN_pronoun] crafted with their dexterous hands.

BackstoryDef.title: ratkin librarian
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] is a librarian tasked to catalog and protect Ratkin scholarly works and literature. [PAWN_pronoun] pursued knowledge for so long being always surrounded by books that they seem long enough to have forgotten how to tend the fields.

BackstoryDef.title: ratkin guardener
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] is a Guardener. Skilled with both the sword or the plowshare, [PAWN_pronoun] is the ideal citizen-soldier. [PAWN_pronoun] tends to their fields and gardens and is expected to protect them with their life.

BackstoryDef.title: ratkin knight
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] is knight of the Ratkin kingdom. Swearing the knight's oath, [PAWN_pronoun] duty is to protect the weak and serve as a strong pillar of the kingdom.

BackstoryDef.title: ratkin knight commander
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef]is a high ranking knight of the Ratkin Kingdom. In accordance with tradition, the leader of the Order of Ratkin knights would be chosen from countryside Ratkin of humble origins.

BackstoryDef.title: ratkin teacher
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] is a village teacher responsible for educating their children. When the village youth all left for the city, [PAWN_pronoun] also decided to leave to teach elsewhere or maybe start a new life.

BackstoryDef.title: ratkin blacksmith
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] is a blacksmith who makes weapons and tools for the local community. Curious about ancient wrecks and machinery, [PAWN_pronoun] went on an adventure to search for stronger materials.

BackstoryDef.title: ratkin thief
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] survives every day by stealing from others. [PAWN_pronoun] left for the wilds in search of another settlement once wanted posters of their face began to spread in the city.

BackstoryDef.title: ratkin ambassador
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] is a diplomat of the Ratkin Kingdom. Due to a diplomatic scandal, [PAWN_pronoun] is stripped of their title and was temporarily exiled until things cool off in the capital.

BackstoryDef.title: ratkin soldier
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] is a soldier trained and equipped based on what information found from abandoned Human research outposts. [PAWN_pronoun] is trained in combat doctrine different from traditional Ratkin ways, and is viewed as odd by Ratkin society.

BackstoryDef.title: ratkin explorer
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was full of curiosity about the world. After learning the true extent of Human civilization from exploring ancient ruins, [PAWN_pronoun] vowed to not stop until they reach the stars.

BackstoryDef.title: ratkin chef
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] is a chef who has a desire to cook with every ingredient in the world. Their most recent obsession, [PAWN_pronoun] has left their job and home to find the best nuts in the world.

BackstoryDef.title: ratkin handmaiden
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] is a servant of a noble household. [PAWN_pronoun] was trained to perform basic household chores, gardening skills and act as a guard when necessary.

BackstoryDef.title: ratkin shooter
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] had good eyesight as a Ratkin. [PAWN_pronoun] volunteered for the military and was trained to become a shooter, learning how to skillfully use all sorts of ranged weapons.

BackstoryDef.title: ratkin doctor
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was a doctor who practiced in the city, [PAWN_pronoun] was banished to the countryside after a being accused of causing a botched operation on a nobleman. [PAWN_pronoun] went from place to place trying to sharpen their medical skills to prove they weren't wrong.

BackstoryDef.title: ratkin army surgeon
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was a doctor who saves lives in the field of battle, ally or foe alike, [PAWN_pronoun] volunteered due to a youthful sense of idealism, but eventually left after becoming jaded from the unchanging reality of war.

BackstoryDef.title: ratkin construction worker
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] is a laborer who works in construction. [PAWN_pronoun] specializes in building underground tunnels.

BackstoryDef.title: ratkin rich
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] had a great talent for cheating others with their hard-earned money. But soon their con was revealed to the public and [PAWN_pronoun] had no choice but to run away and hide in the countryside.

BackstoryDef.title: ratkin sister
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] as a nun, is responsible for preserving and administering ancestral rites or religious affairs in Ratkin society. [PAWN_pronoun] was attacked while on a pilgrimage and was barely able to escape with their life.

BackstoryDef.title: ratkin butcher
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] is a trader who buys livestock to butcher and sell their meat or process them into meat products.

BackstoryDef.title: ratkin city maid
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] is a housekeeper working in the city. [PAWN_pronoun] was employed by an eccentric master who only picks housekeepers based on their attractiveness.

BackstoryDef.title: ratkin idol
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] entertains the masses through song and dance. Unfortunately [PAWN_pronoun] got in an accident while on tour, waking up in an unknown location.

BackstoryDef.title: ratkin murderer
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was a mad criminal infamous in the city. [PAWN_pronoun] enjoys committing murder then taking advantage of their nimbleness to quickly escape from the scene of the crime.

BackstoryDef.title: ratkin assistant researcher
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: As a researcher, [PAWN_nameDef] helps with studying various scientific fields developed by Ratkin though not specializing in one. [PAWN_pronoun] tries to learn what they could at every opportunity.

BackstoryDef.title: ratkin scientist
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: As a scientist, [PAWN_nameDef] studies ancient scientific theories from Human research. [PAWN_pronoun] became so engrossed in their work it took a toll on their body, becoming physically weak and developing bad eyesight.

BackstoryDef.title: ratkin engineer
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] is a engineer who creates machines and fabricates mechanical parts. [PAWN_pronoun] once used their talent to restore a mechanoid but it berserk, which caused a lot of trouble.

BackstoryDef.title: ratkin agriculturist
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] immigrated to the city to study as an agronomist. [PAWN_pronoun] wishes to return and fulfill their lifelong dream of developing the agricultural system of their hometown.

BackstoryDef.title: ratkin bounty hunter
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] is a bounty hunter who catches wanted criminals and other fugitives. But one day, [PAWN_pronoun] was left with a sense of skepticism about their job after finding out that the escaped slaves they were to capture were just children.

BackstoryDef.title: ratkin test subject
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] is a test subject in experiments. [PAWN_pronoun] been genetically or bionically reinforced by a number of experiments to test the efficacy of created xenogenes or bionics, before being put to indefinite storage like the other test subjects after the lead researcher died. One day [PAWN_pronoun] woke up from cryosleep barely surviving in a sea of flame and wreckage. [PAWN_pronoun] found themselves in a foreign land, wandering aimlessly trying to find a new purpose in life.

BackstoryDef.title: ratkin vagabond
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] is a mysterious wanderer. No one knows about their past, but the wisdom and skills [PAWN_pronoun] gained from being a wanderer for so long are reliable enough to survive in the wilds.

BackstoryDef.title: ratkin boomrat
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: Unlike other Ratkin, [PAWN_nameDef] is obsessed with fire and explosions. Unable to fit in the agriculture focused Ratkin society due to their destructive tendencies, [PAWN_pronoun] is pressed into joining the military where dangerous types like them are isolated and put on dangerous missions suitable for their skillset.
